data.description: Cisco IP Phone interface using XML Objects
data.similar:
no other modules exist at this time - may collaborate with another
    author considering a similar release
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This package (Cisco::IPPhone) creates XML objects for displaying
    text and graphics on Cisco 7940/7960 IP Phones. This package uses an
    object-oriented interface and implements all 9 Cisco XML objects
    including (Menu, Text, Input, Directory, Image, GraphicMenu,
    IconMenu, Execute, and Response). The SDK available from Cisco
    requires Microsoft IIS, ASP's, Javascript, JSP's, and COM objects.
    This PERL module can be used with any web server where PERL runs
    providing a unique alternative to the Cisco SDK. This package is
    complete and documented with pod. It is ready to be tested.

    This package is specific to Cisco IPPhones so it makes sense to use
    the existing Cisco:: namespace.
